message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway from my original offer. I'll give you a new price of $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll go down to $122.50. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $117?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to my minimum price, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll go down to $119. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the product. But I'm not going any lower.
I understand your concerns, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $116?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll go down to $118. It's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your final offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last offer and your final offer. Would you be willing to go down to $114?
